sections.name: Description
sections.html: The master universalist draws power and knowledge from all schools of magic.

tactics.name: Before Combat
tactics.text: The wizard casts foresight, mage armor, mind blank, moment of prescience, protection from energy (fire), resist energy (cold, electricity), spell turning, and stoneskin.

tactics.name: During Combat
tactics.text: The wizard casts maximized disintegrate, meteor swarm, mass charm monster, and prismatic spray.

tactics.name: Base Statistics
tactics.text: Without foresight, mage armor, mind blank, moment of prescience, protection from energy, resist energy, spell turning, and stoneskin, the wizard’s base statistics are AC 20, touch 16, flat-footed 19; Fort +14, Ref +12, Will +18; +2 vs. enchantments; Defensive Abilities none; DR none; Immune sleep; Resist none; CMD 25.
